com.nhn.android.maps
Class NMapController

java.lang.Object
  com.nhn.android.maps.NMapController

public class NMapController
extends java.lang.Object

A utility class to manage panning and zooming of NMapView. The map can be displayed in a number of view modes.

Author:
kyjkim
See Also:
setMapViewMode(viewMode).

setZoomToFixingPoint

public void setZoomToFixingPoint(boolean zoomToFixingPoint)
set zoom in to double tapped point. default is false and zoom in at visible center of map view

Parameters:
zoomToFixingPoint - true or false to zoom in to double tapped point.

isZoomToFixingPoint

public boolean isZoomToFixingPoint()
Returns:
true zoom in to double tapped point, false zoom in at visible center of map view.

setBoundsVisible

public void setBoundsVisible(int left,
                             int top,
                             int right,
                             int bottom)
Set the bounds which is visible area of the NMapView. By default it is equal to the bounds of NMapView with origin at the upper left corner.

Parameters:
left - upper left coordinate of the view frame relative to the NMapView.
top - upper top coordinate of the view frame relative to the NMapView.
right - lower right coordinate of the view frame relative to the NMapView.
bottom - lower bottom coordinate of the view frame relative to the NMapView.

getBoundsVisible

public Rect getBoundsVisible()
Get the bounds which is visible area of the NMapView.

Returns:
visible bounds of the NMapView and it is relative to the upper left corner of the NMapView.

getVisibleCenterY

public int getVisibleCenterY()
Returns:
vertical center of the visible bounds.

Returns:
horizontal center of the visible bounds.

setMapVersionUrl

public boolean setMapVersionUrl(java.lang.String[] vectorUrls,
                                java.lang.String[] satelliteUrls,
                                java.lang.String[] overlayUrls,
                                java.lang.String[] trafficUrls,
                                java.lang.String[] panoramaUrls,
                                java.lang.String[] bicycleUrls)
Set map versions for URL constructions. This should be invoked prior to display NMapView.

Parameters:
vectorUrls - base image url for vector tiles.
satelliteUrls - base image url for satellite tiles.
overlayUrls - base image url for overlay tiles
trafficUrls - base image url for traffic tiles
panoramaUrls - base image url for panorama tiles
bicycleUrls - base image url for bicycle tiles

getMapCenter

public NGeoPoint getMapCenter()
Get the center point of the map view. Note: This returns the center point of the visible bounds when it is set by setBoundsVisible().

Returns:
the current center-point position of the map view in GRS coordinates (longitude, latitude).
See Also:
setBoundsVisible

getMapCenter

public NGeoPoint getMapCenter(boolean checkVisibleBounds)

getMapCenterInUtmk

public com.nhn.android.maps.maplib.NGPoint getMapCenterInUtmk()
Get the center point of the map view. Note: This returns the center point of the visible bounds when it was by setBoundsVisible().

Returns:
the current center-point position of the map view in UTMK coordinates (utmkX, utmkY).
See Also:
setBoundsVisible

getZoomLevelToBoundsE6

public int getZoomLevelToBoundsE6(Rect boundsE6)
Get the zoom level of the map view so that the given bounds to be displayed within NMapView.

Parameters:
boundsE6 - bounds in GRS coordinates multiplied by E6

zoomToBoundsE6

public void zoomToBoundsE6(Rect boundsE6)
Attempts to adjust the zoom level and center of the map view so that the given bounds to be displayed within NMapView.

Parameters:
boundsE6 - bounds in GRS coordinates multiplied by E6

                           int level)

Parameters:
boundsE6 - bounds in GRS coordinates multiplied by E6
level - zoom level
